lines.text:
[hearing a howling noise]
Probably a dog caught in a trap!
But, Miss Hammond... Helga! No Hammond ever ventures into the rocky lane on a foggy night!

[in the crypt]
Everyone seems to be resting in peace.
There are some things that are beyond the understanding of us that live on this Earth!
Perhaps there are some things in this world that science has not yet found out about.

[hearing a howl]
Sounds like a lost soul!
Don't worry, Christy; wolves will never bother you.
When stars are bright on a frosty night / Beware thy bane on the rocky lane.
I've seen that look on your face before, I think you've got your man.
I'm not sure if it is a man.
I should have warned you. Miss Christopher suffers from an overdeveloped supercalaphegalus.
Sometimes dogs are smarter than folks.
